homePage.bodyTitle: All our room types are including complementary breakfast

texts.title: Luxury redefined
texts.text: Our rooms are designed to transport you into an environment made for leisure. Take your mind off the day-to-day of home life and find a private paradise for yourself.

texts.title: Leave your worries in the sand
texts.text: We love life at the beach. Being close to the ocean with access to endless sandy beach ensures a relaxed state of mind. It seems like time stands still watching the ocean.
